org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeCompensatableActivity

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeActivityScopeImpl
public interface IAeCompensatableActivity

Interface mark an activity as compensatable.

Method Summary
 AeCompensationHandler getCompensationHandler()
          Returns the compensation handler.
 AeCompInfo getCompInfo()
          Getter for the AeCompInfo object.
 void terminateCompensationHandler()
          Terminates currently active compensation handler if the compensation handler is executing.
 

Method Detail

getCompInfo

public AeCompInfo getCompInfo()
Getter for the AeCompInfo object.

getCompensationHandler

public AeCompensationHandler getCompensationHandler()
Returns the compensation handler. If a handler has not been installed, then an implicit handler will be installed and returned.

Returns:
the compensation handler.

terminateCompensationHandler

public void terminateCompensationHandler()
                                  throws AeBusinessProcessException
Terminates currently active compensation handler if the compensation handler is executing.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
